channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Twin Peaks cast touring the US
item.description: 🎸 Who knew the Twin Peaks cast could rock on stage too? Catch their US tour now! 🤘 #TwinPeaksBandOnTour

item.title: Jane Remover Releases New Song “Supernova”: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Blast off into the weekend with Jane Remover's stellar new track "Supernova"! 🚀🌟 #NewMusicFriday #MusicDiscovery

item.title: Forth Wanderers Announce First Album Since 2018, Share New Video: Watch
item.description: 🎉 New music alert! Forth Wanderers are back with a brand new album and music video. Watch now! 🎶 #ForthWanderers #NewMusic

item.title: Metric livestreaming Toronto ‘Fantasies’ show
item.description: 🌟 Tune in as Metric brings the 'Fantasies' magic straight to your screen! 🎶✨ #livemusic #metric #virtualconcert

item.title: Richard Ashcroft Shares “Lover,” First New Song In Seven Years
item.description: 🌟 Richard Ashcroft is back! 🎶 Listen to his new track "Lover" now and get ready for those nostalgic vibes! #NewMusicAlert 🎸
